alert.note: Alert for Albemarle; Nelson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 1:09PM EDT until August 21 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Albemarle County in central Virginia... East Central Nelson County in central Virginia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 109 PM EDT, emergency management reported multiple roads flooded in the Lovingston VA area along with areas along VA 29. Between 4 and 5.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Shipman... Schuyler... Lovingston... Elma... Rockfish... Faber... FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
